name: Dictum Mobilis
tagline: iOS Wrapper for William Whitaker's Words
body:
### What is Dictum Mobilis?
Dictum Mobilis ("Mobile Words") is a wrapper around [William Whitaker's Words](http://archives.nd.edu/words.html). The goal is for Dictum Mobilis to be small and lightweight, storing no info about the user and taking up an extremely small amount of space on the user's phone.

### Can I Help?
Yes, you can! Dictum Mobilis is open-source and on GitHub in a [repository.](https://github.com/hodgeswt/Dictum-Mobilis). Currently, Dictum Mobilis doesn't work due to an [`NSException`.](https://github.com/hodgeswt/Dictum-Mobilis/issues/1). This is the main issue that needs solved before Dictum Mobilis is released.

If you contribute to Dictum Mobilis, you agree that you will not receive any royalties from the app if any come to the [main developer and creator.](http://willthodges.weebly.com).

## Developer

The main developer is W. Hodges. You can view his webpage at http://willthodges.weebly.com
